The air grew still! There began a small quivering in the earth's core itself, not noticed by many. The sky began to darken and the inhabitants of the world began to grow aware of the impending doom that was falling on them, the roots of fear began clutching at their hearts! The bowels of the earth shook as the mighty force of the Gods split the world in two! The rain cascaded down amidst ceaseless lightning! Then suddenly a soul wrenching quiet fell! The world as it was known was never to be as it was before! The Gods had created two worlds, mirrored images of each other, only the inhabitants upon them changed! On this new world that the survivors called "Zebuxoruk" dwells a wolf pack called "The Lone Wolves Of Norrath" Beware this pack! You will never know when you're being watched or followed! Can you feel their eyes upon you, smell the scent of the now hunting wolves around you as it mingles with the sweet, thick, odor of freshly spilt blood? Do you sense the lust of killing that permeates the very essence of the area around you? Proceed inside the Den's Depths below if you dare! Beware the hunters! They will be drawn to your fear! They know you are here!
